channel.title: DNN review on Vishal Keshav
channel.description: Recent content in DNN review on Vishal Keshav

item.title: Review of Computer Vision Architecture
item.description: Papers from 2018 Updating soon... Papers from 2017 More is Less: A More Complicated Network with Less Inference Complexity Problem solved: With each convolution layer, reduce the computation of convolution that results in zero activation. Hints about zero features that may lead to zero activation is given by a parallel light-weight convolution (either spatial or depth wise) activation. LCCL (low cost collaborative layer) are parallel low cost convolutions providing zero outcome hints to main convolution.
